content: this simple hat is based on my ten stitch twist pattern and is worked in a spiral from the top down you never have more than ten stitches on your needles and it is knitted in garter stitch throughout my hat was knitted with 80g of bramble dk and fits a large adult head it could easily be made shorter if you don t want to turn up the brim or for a smaller head all my ravelry patterns are free to download but if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease you can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here 1 happy knitting 1 https //www justgiving com/page/frankie-brown
